short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically track what you are watching in emovi.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically track what you are watching on Netflix, Amazon Prime & HBO Go. Your watched history will be auto-saved to web.emovi.app.
